tooltips.sessionActive: Session is currently active in memory
tooltips.multipleIpsShared: This nickname is shared by multiple IPs

status.connectedTooltip: API Status: Connected - All backend services are responding normally
status.disconnectedTooltip: API Status: Disconnected - Unable to connect to backend services
status.reconnectingTooltip: API Status: Reconnecting - Attempting to restore connection to backend services

dashboard.title: Dashboard

editModeInstructions.dragging: Tap another card to swap, or tap the same card to cancel
editModeInstructions.initial: Tap any card to select it, then tap another to swap positions

dashboard.dragHint: Use the Edit button to rearrange your dashboard cards

totalCache.description: Total cache capacity configured for this instance, based on your cache drive size.

usedSpace.description: Live is current size; Historical is the hourly average from snapshots.

bandwidthSaved.description: Data served from cache instead of the internet. Higher values mean better caching efficiency.

addedToCache.description: Content downloaded and stored in the cache, available for future requests.

totalServed.description: Total data delivered to all clients, including cache hits and new downloads.

activeDownloads.description: Downloads currently in progress (Live only); hidden in historical views.

activeClients.description: Clients currently downloading (Live only); hidden in historical views.

cacheHitRatio.description: Percent of data served from cache; higher ratios mean better efficiency.

bandwidthSaved.description: ↑ means more saved recently; ↓ means less saved recently, compared to earlier in the selected time range.

addedToCache.description: ↑ means more cached recently; ↓ means less cached recently, compared to earlier in the selected time range.

totalServed.description: ↑ means more served recently; ↓ means less served recently, compared to earlier in the selected time range.

cacheHitRatio.description: ↑ improving; ↓ declining. Shows change in percentage points.

downloadsPanel.title: Downloads
downloadsPanel.activeDownloadsOnly: Active downloads only available in Live mode

emptyStates.noActiveDesc: Downloads will appear here in real-time

topClients.title: Top Clients
topClients.noData: No client data available for selected time range

peakUsageHours.title: Peak Usage Hours
peakUsageHours.description: Shows when downloads usually happen across the day based on your history.

dataPeriod.multiDay: Based on {{days}} days of data. Values are averaged per day to show typical patterns.
dataPeriod.singleDay: Based on the selected time range.

peakHour.multiDay: The hour that averages the most download activity across all days.
peakHour.singleDay: The hour with the most downloads in the selected period.

currentHour.multiDay: Shows the typical activity for the current hour (historical average).

peakUsageHours.heatmapNote: Heatmap: Each block is an hour (12AM-11PM). Brighter colors mean more activity.

cacheGrowthTrend.title: Cache Growth

netGrowth.description: Adjusts for cache that was cleared or deleted

dataPoints.description: Time buckets with download activity. More points mean finer detail.

cacheGrowthTrend.cacheCleared: Cache was cleared in this period; the trend accounts for deletions.
cacheGrowthTrend.dataAddedNote: Shows data added during the period (not total cache size).

errors.updateAllowedTimeFormats: Failed to update allowed time formats

points.theme: Reset theme to default guest theme

points.deleted: All guest sessions will be permanently deleted

authenticated.label: Authenticated

toggle.lockedTitle: Guest mode is locked - new guests cannot log in

points.marked: The device is marked as revoked but not deleted

info.deletedOwnSession: You deleted your own session. Logging out...

header.activeTooltip: Active downloads only available in Live mode

empty.title: No Active Downloads

tab.title: Downloads
tab.emptyRecorded: No downloads recorded yet. Downloads will appear here as clients request content.

emptyRange.title: No downloads found in selected time range
emptyRange.description: The dashboard shows active downloads (currently in progress), while this list shows downloads that started within the selected time period. Try switching to Live to see all downloads, or adjust your time range.

sections.individualDescription: Downloads that couldn't be grouped by game name

empty.title: No Downloads Yet
empty.description: Download activity will appear here once your Lancache starts serving content.

sections.authRequiredDesc: Please authenticate to access this section.
sections.guestModeDesc: Management features are disabled in guest mode. Please authenticate to access full functionality.
sections.migratedOperations: Migrated {{count}} operations from local storage to server

data.title: Data Configuration

data.confirmClearMessage: You are about to permanently delete data from the following table(s):

confirmClearWarnings.exportFirst: Export any data you need before continuing
confirmClearWarnings.depotMappings: Games will show as "Unknown" until mappings are rebuilt
confirmClearWarnings.events: All events and their download associations will be permanently deleted
confirmClearWarnings.userSessionsLogout: All devices will be logged out and the application will reload
confirmClearWarnings.userSessionsCleared: All registered devices will be cleared - you will need to re-authenticate
confirmClearWarnings.clientGroups: All client groups and their member associations will be permanently deleted
confirmClearWarnings.prefillSessions: All prefill sessions and their history entries will be permanently deleted
confirmClearWarnings.bannedSteamUsers: All banned Steam users will be unblocked and can prefill again

logEntries.label: Log Entries
logEntries.description: Raw access log entries from nginx cache logs
logEntries.details: Individual log line records used for analytics and reporting

downloads.label: Downloads
downloads.description: Download records with game associations and statistics
downloads.details: Tracked downloads with game names, sizes, and timestamps

clientStats.label: Client Statistics
clientStats.details: Bandwidth and download counts grouped by IP address

serviceStats.label: Service Statistics
serviceStats.details: Total downloads and bandwidth usage by CDN service

steamDepotMappings.label: Steam Depot Mappings
steamDepotMappings.description: Depot ID to game name associations from SteamKit
steamDepotMappings.details: Mappings used to identify which game a depot belongs to. Also clears game names from existing downloads.
steamDepotMappings.affectedPages: Dashboard • Downloads • All game name displays

cachedGameDetections.label: Cache Detection Results
cachedGameDetections.description: Cached results from game and service detection scans
cachedGameDetections.details: Pre-computed game and service detections from cache files to speed up dashboard loading

cachedCorruptionDetections.label: Corruption Detection Cache
cachedCorruptionDetections.description: Cached results from cache file corruption analysis
cachedCorruptionDetections.details: Pre-computed corruption detection results to speed up corruption status checks

clientGroups.label: Client Groups
clientGroups.details: User-defined groups with nicknames and colors. Also clears group member associations.

events.label: Events
events.description: Custom events for tracking LAN parties and gaming sessions
events.details: User-created events with date ranges. Clears associated download links via cascade.

eventDownloads.label: Event Download Links
eventDownloads.details: Links connecting downloads to events (both auto-tagged and manual)

prefillSessions.label: Prefill Sessions
prefillSessions.details: Active and historical prefill sessions with status and configuration. Also clears prefill history.

bannedSteamUsers.label: Banned Steam Users
bannedSteamUsers.description: Steam accounts blocked from prefill operations
bannedSteamUsers.details: Users banned due to authentication failures or rate limiting

userSessions.label: User Sessions
userSessions.description: Active and historical user session records
userSessions.details: Session tracking with device info, IP addresses, and authentication status
userSessions.affectedPages: All users will be logged out

userPreferences.label: User Preferences
userPreferences.details: Theme selections and UI customization settings linked to sessions
userPreferences.affectedPages: Theme and UI settings reset to defaults

storage.title: Storage Management
storage.subtitle: Manage cache directories, process logs, detect corrupted files, and identify cached games

settings.subtitle: Manage authentication, demo mode, and display preferences
settings.demoModeDesc: Test the interface with simulated data
settings.mockDataDesc: Simulates realistic cache data and download activity
settings.mockModeActive: Mock mode active — API actions are disabled
settings.nginxLogRotationDesc: Signal nginx to reopen log files after manipulation
settings.nginxLogRotationEnvVar: Add the following environment variable to your docker-compose.yml:

displayPreferences.sharpCornersDesc: Use square corners instead of rounded
displayPreferences.disableTooltipsDesc: Hide tooltip hints throughout the UI
displayPreferences.showDatasourceLabelsDesc: Display datasource info when multiple sources
displayPreferences.alwaysShowYearDesc: Include year in dates even for current year

integrations.title: Integration & Services
integrations.subtitle: Connect to Steam, configure Grafana endpoints, and manage external service integrations

clients.title: Client Nicknames
clients.subtitle: Assign friendly names to client IPs for easier identification
clients.noNicknamesDesc: Add a nickname to give a friendly name to client IPs
clients.withoutNicknamesDesc: These client IPs don't have nicknames assigned. Click "Add Nickname" above to give them friendly names.
clients.clickAddNicknameTooltip: Click "Add Nickname" to name this IP
clients.excludedIpsDesc: Excluded clients are hidden from all pages and stats.
clients.allKnownExcluded: All known clients are already excluded.
clients.supportsIpv4Ipv6: Supports IPv4 and IPv6. Separate multiple IPs with commas or spaces.
clients.deleteNicknameConfirm: Delete nickname {{nickname}}? The associated IPs will no longer have a nickname.

cache.title: Disk Cache Management
cache.subtitle: Clear cached game files from disk
cache.clearingCacheDeletes: Clearing cache deletes ALL cached game files from disk
cache.clickRefreshToCalculate: Click refresh to calculate cache size

deletionMethods.rsyncDesc: Rsync with empty directory (best for NFS/SMB)

help.title: Deletion Methods

preserve.description: Deletes files one by one and keeps the folder structure intact

removeAll.description: Deletes entire directories at once, fastest for local storage

rsync.description: Uses rsync --delete, safest for network storage (NFS/SMB)

help.warning: Clearing the cache deletes all cached game files. Clients will need to download content again.

readOnly.title: Cache directory is read-only
readOnly.description: Remove :ro from your docker-compose volume mounts to enable cache clearing.
readOnly.descriptionSuffix: from your docker-compose volume mounts to enable cache clearing.

importantPoints.removed: All cached game data will be permanently removed
importantPoints.redownload: Clients will need to download content from the internet

modal.deleteFromDatasource: This will permanently delete all cached game files from the {{datasource}} cache. Games will need to redownload content after clearing.
modal.deleteFromAll: This will permanently delete all cached game files from all datasources. Games will need to redownload content after clearing.
modal.stopActiveDownloads: Stop all active downloads before proceeding
modal.historyPreserved: Download history and settings will be preserved

corruption.title: Corruption Detection
corruption.subtitle: Find and fix corrupted cache files
corruption.loadPreviousResults: Load previous scan results from database
corruption.deleteCorrupted: Delete cache files and remove log entries for corrupted chunks
corruption.scanningMessage: Scanning logs for corrupted chunks... This may take several minutes for large log files.

whatThisDoes.title: What This Does
whatThisDoes.description: Finds cache chunks with 3+ repeated MISS requests, which usually means the cached file is corrupted and must be re-downloaded.

help.warning: Removal affects both cache and logs, so write access to both is required.

alerts.logsAndCacheReadOnly: Logs and cache directories are read-only
alerts.requiresWriteAccess: Corruption removal requires write access to both logs and cache. Remove
alerts.requiresNginxSignal: Corruption removal requires signaling nginx to reopen logs afterward.

noCorrupted.title: No corrupted chunks detected
noCorrupted.subtitle: Cache appears healthy - all chunks are being served successfully

noCachedData.title: No cached data available
noCachedData.subtitle: Click the Scan button to detect corrupted cache chunks

notifications.loadedResults: Loaded previous results: {{chunks}} corrupted chunks across {{services}} services
notifications.noCorruptedInPrevious: No corrupted chunks found in previous scan
notifications.noPreviousResults: No previous corruption scan results found

errors.removeCorrupted: Failed to remove corrupted chunks for {{service}}
errors.loadDetails: Failed to load corruption details for {{service}}

modal.title: Remove Corrupted Chunks
modal.confirmRemove: Remove all corrupted cache chunks for {{service}}?
modal.mayTakeSeveralMinutes: May take several minutes for large cache directories
modal.validFilesRemain: Valid {{service}} cache files will remain intact

gameDetection.title: Game Cache Detection
gameDetection.subtitle: Scan cache to find games and services with stored files
gameDetection.loadPreviousResults: Load previous detection results from database
gameDetection.removeGameCache: Remove all cache files for this game
gameDetection.removeServiceCache: Remove all cache files for this service
gameDetection.dockerSocketRequired: Docker socket required for log cleanup
gameDetection.failedToRemoveGame: Failed to remove game from cache
gameDetection.failedToRemoveService: Failed to remove service from cache
gameDetection.scanningNote: This may take several minutes for large databases and cache directories
gameDetection.filteredBy: Filtered by <1>{{datasource}}</1>: {{gameCount}} game{{gameCount, plural, one {} other {s}}}, {{serviceCount}} service{{serviceCount, plural, one {} other {s}}}

game.description: Removes cache files, log entries, and database records for a game

service.description: Removes non-game caches (Riot, Blizzard, Epic, WSUS)

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.description: Scans the database for games and services, verifies cache files on disk, then shows size and file count for each.

help.note: Process access logs first so the database has entries to scan.

emptyState.noGamesServices: No games or services with cache files detected
emptyState.noGamesServicesDatasource: No games or services found in {{datasource}}
emptyState.processLogsFirst: Process access logs to populate the database first
emptyState.clickFullScan: Click "Full Scan" to scan your cache directory

cacheReadOnly.title: Cache directory is read-only
cacheReadOnly.description: Remove <1>:ro</1> from your docker-compose volume mounts to enable game cache detection.

placeholders.searchGames: Search by game name or AppID...

datasources.title: Log Processing
datasources.subtitleSingle: Import historical data or monitor new downloads

modal.choosePosition: Choose where to start processing logs from:
modal.beginningDescription: Process entire log history (duplicate detection prevents reimporting)
modal.endDescription: Monitor only new downloads going forward

messages.positionResetAll: Log position reset for all datasources

help.title: Log Processing

process.description: Import log entries into the database from the current position

reposition.description: Choose where processing starts: beginning (reprocess all) or end (new entries only)

datasource.description: A named cache/logs pair for separate LANCache instances

help.note: The Rust processor de-duplicates to avoid reimporting entries.

options.batchSizeHint: Number of records to process at once (100-10000)
options.syncMode: Sync mode: update existing + add new

validation.hintDeveLanCache: Make sure to select a DeveLanCacheUI_Backend database for this import type.
validation.hintLancacheManager: Make sure to select a LancacheManager database for this import type.

confirm.existingUpdated: Existing records will be updated with new data
confirm.existingSkipped: Existing records will be skipped (no changes)
confirm.duplicateDetection: Duplicates detected by: Client IP + Start Time (UTC)

deveLanCache.description: Database from the DeveLanCache monitoring system

browse.description: Choose a SQLite database file from disk

compatibility.title: Compatibility
compatibility.description: Pick the import type that matches your database. If the database is outside the container, mount it as a Docker volume.

help.warning: Stop the source application before importing to avoid database locks.

alerts.mockMode: Mock mode is enabled - import functionality is disabled
alerts.skipInfo: Most users can skip this feature. Only use if you have an existing database from a previous installation that you want to import.

emptyState.title: No database files found
emptyState.subtitle: Try using Browse or Manual mode

logRemoval.title: Log Removal
logRemoval.subtitle: Remove service entries from log files

loading.mayTakeMinutes: This may take several minutes for large log files

modal.removeQuestion: Remove all {{service}} entries from {{datasource}} logs? This will reduce log size and improve performance.
modal.mayTakeMinutes: May take several minutes for large log files
modal.cachedFilesRemain: Cached {{service}} game files will remain intact
modal.deleteQuestion: Delete the entire access.log file for {{datasource}}? This will remove all download history for this datasource.
modal.permanentlyDelete: This will permanently delete all log entries
modal.historyLost: Download history and statistics will be lost
modal.cachedGamesRemain: Cached game files will remain intact

errors.loadFailed: Failed to load service log counts
errors.unexpectedResponse: Unexpected response when starting log removal for {{service}}
errors.readOnly: Logs directory is read-only. Remove :ro from docker-compose volume mount.

whatThisDoes.title: What This Does
whatThisDoes.description: Removes access.log entries for a selected service to reduce log size and speed up processing.

help.note: Cache files stay on disk; only log data is removed.

logsReadOnly.title: Logs directory is read-only
logsReadOnly.description: Remove :ro from your docker-compose volume mounts to enable log removal.

dockerSocket.title: Docker socket not available
dockerSocket.description: Log removal requires signaling nginx to reopen logs afterward.

emptyState.title: No services with log entries found
emptyState.subtitle: Services appear here when they have downloadable content in the logs

bothUnavailable.title: Both V2 and V1 Unavailable
bothUnavailable.description: Both Steam Web API V2 and V1 are currently unavailable. This may be a temporary Steam service issue. Please try again later.

removeModal.title: Remove Steam Web API Key
removeModal.message: Are you sure you want to remove the Steam Web API key? If V2 becomes unavailable, you will need to reconfigure the key to use V1 fallback.
removeModal.warning: This action will remove the stored API key from the server.

v2.description: No API key required, but it can be rate-limited or unavailable

v1.description: Requires an API key and works as a fallback when V2 is down

apiKey.title: API Key
apiKey.description: Optional. Only needed if V2 is unavailable. Anonymous users can use the GitHub download instead.

getApiKey.before: Get your free API key at
getApiKey.after: and approve the confirmation in the Steam Mobile app.

help.note: Get your free API key at steamcommunity.com/dev/apikey and approve the confirmation in the Steam Mobile app.

steamAuth.title: Steam PICS Authentication
steamAuth.v2Required: Steam account login requires V2 API which is currently unavailable.
steamAuth.v1KeyProvides: Your V1 API key already provides access to playtest/restricted games since it's tied to your Steam account.
steamAuth.configureV1Key: Configure a V1 API key above to access playtest/restricted games.

status.canAccessRestricted: Can access playtest and restricted games

steamAuth.autoRebuild: Automatically rebuild depot mappings after login
steamAuth.manualRebuild: Manually trigger depot mapping rebuild after login

anonymous.description: Public games only, no Steam account needed

accountLogin.description: Access playtest and restricted games with your Steam account

depotMapping.title: Depot Mapping
depotMapping.description: Automatic mode rebuilds depot mappings after login. Manual mode lets you rebuild when you choose.

help.note: Account login requires V2 API. A V1 API key alone can access restricted games but does not allow login.

depotMapping.title: Depot Mapping
depotMapping.subtitle: Automatically identifies Steam games from depot IDs
depotMapping.downloadingDescription: Fetching pre-created depot mappings (290k+ depots). This may take a few moments.
depotMapping.applyingMappingsDescription: Pre-created depot mappings have been imported from GitHub. The system is now applying these mappings to your download history.
depotMapping.intervalFixedNote: Interval is fixed at 30 minutes for GitHub mode

scanSkipped.title: Automatic Scan Skipped - Data Update Required
scanSkipped.description: The scheduled incremental scan was skipped because the change gap is too large. Please download the latest pre-created data from GitHub to reset your baseline, then incremental scans will work again.

errors.changeGapTooLarge: Change gap too large - please download data from GitHub

incremental.description: Checks only changed apps for fast updates

full.description: Fetches all apps (about 300k) for a complete rebuild

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Automatic Schedule runs in the background at your chosen interval. Apply Now runs the selected mode immediately.

help.note: GitHub mode checks every 30 minutes to stay in sync with hourly updates.

database.title: Database Management
database.description: Select which database tables you want to clear. Cached files on disk will remain untouched.

logEntries.description: Raw nginx access log records used for analytics

downloads.description: Download sessions with stats and timestamps

depotMappings.description: Depot-to-game mappings (also clears cached game names)

help.note: Only database records are cleared; cached files on disk are untouched.

errors.authRequired: Full authentication required for management operations
errors.selectAtLeastOne: Please select at least one table to clear

themes.title: Theme Management
themes.previewActive: Preview mode active. Select a theme to apply it permanently.

dropzone.title: Drop a theme file here, or click to browse

guestMode.title: Guest Mode - Theme Selection Disabled
guestMode.description: Guest users cannot change themes. The theme is set by the administrator.

themes.authRequired: Authentication required to create, upload, or delete custom themes

customize.title: Customize
customize.selectThemeHint: Select a theme above and click Edit to customize its colors
customize.colorGroupsInfo: Themes contain {{totalColors}} customizable colors organized into {{groupCount}} groups

allImported.title: All themes imported!
allImported.description: Click the eye icon to view installed themes

system.description: Built-in themes that cannot be deleted

custom.description: Themes you create or import from the community

previewMode.title: Preview Mode
previewMode.description: Try a theme temporarily. Click Apply to make it your active theme.

help.note: Theme files use TOML. Download a sample to see the expected structure.

notifications.fileTooLarge: File size must be less than 1MB

grafana.title: Live API Endpoints for Grafana
grafana.securedDescription: These endpoints require API key authentication. Configure your API key in Grafana or Prometheus.
grafana.publicDescription: These endpoints are publicly accessible. Use them directly in Grafana or Prometheus.
grafana.replaceApiKey: Replace 'your-api-key-here' with the API key from your lancache-manager instance
grafana.portInfo: Port 80 is the internal container port. External access uses your mapped port (e.g., 8080:80)
grafana.staleDataWarning: Scrape interval is faster than data refresh - you may see stale data

cache.description: Capacity, usage, hit and miss bytes, and hit ratio

activity.description: Active downloads, connected clients, and per-service counters

integration.title: Integration
integration.description: Works with Prometheus and Grafana JSON datasource plugins. Poll every 10-30 seconds for near-real-time monitoring.

help.note: Toggle authentication below or via docker-compose environment variables.

gc.aggressivenessDesc: How often the system checks and cleans memory
gc.thresholdDesc: Memory limit that triggers cleanup when exceeded
gc.runGcTooltip: Manually run garbage collection once (5s cooldown)
gc.noRestartRequired: Changes take effect immediately — no restart required.

fileBrowser.noDatabaseFiles: No database files found in this location

logRotation.unableToLoad: Unable to load log rotation status
logRotation.addEnvVar: Add the following environment variable to your docker-compose.yml:
logRotation.runsAutomatically: Runs automatically at startup and on schedule
logRotation.enableScheduled: Enable scheduled rotation to run automatically
logRotation.manualRotationDesc: Signal nginx to reopen log files immediately

description.requiresKeyOrGuest: Management features require API key or guest access

modal.expiredMessage: Your guest session has expired. Please authenticate with an API key or start a new guest session.
modal.guestMessage: For full management features, please authenticate with your API key.
modal.unauthenticatedMessage: Management operations require authentication. Please enter your API key or continue as guest.
modal.step1: SSH into your LANCache Manager server

regenerateModal.title: Regenerate API Key
regenerateModal.message: Regenerating the API key will immediately log out all connected devices and guests, requiring everyone to re-authenticate with the new key.
regenerateModal.point1: The API key will be regenerated
regenerateModal.point2: All users and guests will be logged out immediately
regenerateModal.point3: Steam integration will be logged out

prefillSessions.title: Prefill Sessions
prefillSessions.subtitle: Manage Steam Prefill daemon sessions and user bans
prefillSessions.noActiveSessionsDesc: Sessions appear here when users start Steam Prefill

tooltips.sessionActive: Session is currently active in memory

bannedUsers.title: Banned Steam Users ({{count}})
bannedUsers.noBannedUsersDesc: Ban users from sessions to prevent them from using prefill

terminateAll.title: Terminate All Sessions
terminateAll.message: This will terminate {{count}} active prefill session(s). All Docker containers will be stopped and removed.
terminateAll.warning: Users will need to restart their prefill sessions.

ban.title: Ban Steam User
ban.message: This will ban the Steam user associated with this session. They will not be able to log in to prefill in the future.
ban.warning: The ban is based on the Steam username. The same user cannot create a new session.

liftBan.title: Lift Ban
liftBan.message: Are you sure you want to lift this ban? The user will be able to use prefill again.

modal.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete "{{name}}"?

errors.endAfterStart: End time must be after start time

calendar.emptyMonthHint: Click a day to create an event.

legend.create: Click a day to create an event

eventStyle.title: Event style
eventStyle.description: Choose how event bars look on the calendar

weekNumbers.title: Show week numbers
weekNumbers.description: Display ISO week numbers on the left

adjacentMonths.title: Show adjacent months
adjacentMonths.description: Display days from the previous and next months

hideEnded.title: Hide ended events
hideEnded.description: Exclude past events from the calendar view

compactView.title: Compact view
compactView.description: Reduce event height to show more rows

list.emptyDownloads: No downloads recorded during this event

empty.title: No Events
empty.description: Create your first event to start tracking downloads during LAN parties.

startScreen.description: Pre-download Steam games to your cache for faster LAN party downloads. Connect to your Steam library and prefill games before the event.
startScreen.requiresLogin: Requires Steam login to access your game library

loading.lookingForSession: Looking for an active prefill session...

auth.canUsePrefill: You can now use prefill commands
auth.authenticateToAccess: Authenticate to access your game library

activityLog.title: Activity Log
activityLog.subtitle: Status updates and output
activityLog.updatesWillAppear: Commands and status updates will appear here

network.title: Container Network Status
network.publicDnsExpected: Public DNS is expected with host networking. Steam-prefill will detect lancache automatically via localhost. If your cache size grows during downloads, everything is working correctly.
network.publicIpDetected: Public IP detected - lancache-dns may not be configured. Prefill may download from internet instead of populating cache.
network.hostNetworkingHint: If Steam login hangs or times out, try setting Prefill__NetworkMode=bridge in your docker-compose.yml.
network.ipv6UnsupportedHint: IPv6 failures are expected: lancache-dns only supports IPv4. If clients prefer IPv6, disable IPv6 or force IPv4 to avoid bypassing your cache.
network.ipv6BypassDetected: IPv6 resolution detected for this domain. If your router or clients bypass lancache-dns via IPv6, Steam login and prefill can fail. Consider disabling IPv6 or ensuring AAAA records point to your cache.

progress.gameUpToDate: Game is already up to date in cache

loginNotice.title: Login Required to Use Commands
loginNotice.message: All prefill commands require Steam authentication. Click "Login to Steam" above to enable commands. Your credentials are sent directly to the container and never stored by this application.

confirm.downloadMessage: You are about to download {{count}} game. This may take a while and use significant bandwidth.
confirm.downloadMessage_plural: You are about to download {{count}} games. This may take a while and use significant bandwidth.
confirm.downloadAllMessage: This will download ALL games in your Steam library. This could be hundreds of gigabytes and take many hours.
confirm.recentMessage: This will download recently played games (last 2 weeks). This may use significant bandwidth.
confirm.recentPurchasedMessage: This will download recently purchased games (last 2 weeks). This may use significant bandwidth.
confirm.topMessage: This will download the top 50 popular games. This may take a while and use significant bandwidth.
confirm.forceMessage: This will re-download games even if they are already cached. Use this if you suspect cache corruption.
confirm.clearDbMessage: This will remove all cache records from the database. Cached files will remain but tracking data will be lost.
confirm.defaultMessage: Are you sure you want to proceed?

sessionExpired.title: Session expired
sessionExpired.message: This prefill session has expired. Start a new session to continue using Steam prefill.

log.noGamesSelected: No games selected. Use "Select Apps" to choose games for prefill first.
log.startingPrefillAll: Starting prefill of all owned games...
log.startingPrefillRecent: Starting prefill of recently played games...
log.startingPrefillRecentPurchased: Starting prefill of recently purchased games...
log.startingPrefillTop: Starting prefill of top 50 popular games...
log.loginToSteamBeforePrefill: Click "Login to Steam" to authenticate before using prefill commands

gameSelection.title: Select Games to Prefill
gameSelection.importHelp: Paste Steam App IDs from SteamPrefill or any comma-separated list

placeholders.name: e.g., Gaming PC, Living Room, Server

warnings.multipleIpsDesc: All {{count}} IPs will share the same nickname. This is typically used when the same device has multiple IP addresses.
warnings.sharedNicknameDesc: This nickname is shared by {{count}} IPs. Changes will apply to all of them.

emptyStates.noClientsAvailable: No ungrouped clients available. You can add IPs later.

clientGroup.multiIpWarning: This nickname is shared by multiple IPs

placeholders.waitForReset: Please wait for reset to complete...

guestMode.disabled: Guest mode is currently disabled by the administrator.
guestMode.available: Or continue as guest to view data for {{count}} hour.
guestMode.available_plural: Or continue as guest to view data for {{count}} hours.
guestMode.disabledTitle: Guest mode is disabled by the administrator
guestMode.noDataTitle: No data available. Complete setup first.

help.title: Where to find your API key:
help.description: The API key was displayed when you first started the server. Check your server logs for "API Key:" or look in the data/api_key.txt file.

errors.guestModeDisabled: Guest mode is currently disabled by the administrator.
errors.guestModeNoData: Guest mode is not available. No data has been loaded yet.

mobileConfirmation.title: Waiting for Confirmation
mobileConfirmation.description: Open your Steam Mobile App and tap Approve to complete login.
mobileConfirmation.timeoutPrefill: If approval times out, you may need to click "End Session" and try again.
mobileConfirmation.timeoutNormal: Steam sessions expire after ~2 minutes. If it times out, you'll be prompted to enter a 2FA code instead.

emailVerification.title: Email Verification
emailVerification.description: Enter the code sent to your email

twoFactor.title: Two-Factor Authentication
twoFactor.descriptionAuto: Enter code or approve on mobile app
twoFactor.leaveEmptyHint: Leave empty and click confirm to use mobile app approval

security.description: Your password is used once for authentication and never stored. Only secure refresh tokens are saved locally.

errors.failedToSwitchToAnonymous: Failed to switch to anonymous mode
errors.networkError: Network error - failed to remove API key

cacheRemoval.confirmGame: Are you sure you want to remove {{name}} from cache?
cacheRemoval.confirmService: Are you sure you want to remove {{name}} service from cache?

actions.removeLogEntries: Remove ALL log entries for this service from the database
actions.removeDownloadRecords: Remove ALL download records for this service from the database
actions.showProgress: Progress will be shown in the notification bar at the top

fullScan.description: Your depot data is too outdated for incremental updates. Download the latest mappings from GitHub to continue.

steamWebApi.title: Configure Steam Web API Key
steamWebApi.placeholder: Enter your Steam Web API key...

info.description: The Steam Web API V1 requires an API key for access. This is only needed if V2 becomes unavailable.
info.stepsTitle: Steps to get your API key:
info.step3: Enter a domain name (can be anything):
info.step3c: This is just for organization - use any name you prefer
info.step4: Copy your API key and paste below

security.description: Your API key will be encrypted and stored securely alongside your Steam credentials using Microsoft Data Protection API.

errors.networkError: Network error - failed to test API key
errors.networkErrorSave: Network error - failed to save API key

communityNotice.title: Editing Community Theme
communityNotice.description: This is a community theme that receives automatic updates. Your edits will create a custom copy named "{{name}} (Custom)" that won't receive updates. The original theme will be kept for future updates.

delete.title: Delete Theme
delete.message: Delete theme {{name}}? This will permanently remove the theme files from the server.

all.label: All Pages
all.description: View all colors - Shows every color used throughout the application

dashboard.label: Dashboard
dashboard.description: 8 stat cards (Total Cache, Used Space, Bandwidth Saved, Added to Cache, Total Served, Active Downloads, Active Clients, Cache Hit Ratio), service chart, recent downloads panel, top clients table, and drag-to-reorder handles

downloads.label: Downloads
downloads.description: Download cards with game banners, service/client filters (dropdowns), checkboxes (show metadata, hide localhost, etc.), pagination controls, cache hit/miss badges, view mode toggles (compact/normal), and export buttons

clients.label: Clients
clients.description: Client statistics table showing IP addresses, download counts, bandwidth usage, cache hit/miss bytes, hit rate progress bars, and last activity timestamps

services.label: Services
services.description: Service statistics table with platform-colored badges (Steam, Epic, Origin, Blizzard, WSUS, Riot), download counts, bandwidth totals, cache hit/miss bytes, and hit rate progress bars

users.label: Users
users.description: Session management for authenticated users and guests - USER/GUEST badges, user icons, IP addresses, device info, last seen timestamps, revoke/delete actions, and session statistics

events.label: Events
events.description: Event scheduling calendar, event cards with customizable colors, event list with active/upcoming/past status, and event time range filtering

prefill.label: Prefill
prefill.description: Steam Prefill daemon session management, game selection modal, prefill commands (all/recent/top 50), download progress bars, activity log with color-coded entries (success/error/warning/info/download/auth/command), session timer, Steam authentication status

management.label: Management
management.description: Authentication (API keys), Steam integration, database reset/clear buttons, cache management, log processing, corruption detection, game cache detector, theme customization (modals, color pickers, checkboxes, sliders), GC settings, alert banners, and Grafana endpoints

charts.label: Charts & Graphs
charts.description: Enhanced service charts with 8 data series colors, cache hit/miss colors, grid lines, axis labels, legends, and performance trend visualizations

foundation.title: Foundation
foundation.description: Primary, secondary, and accent colors - The core colors that define your theme's visual identity

content.title: Content
content.description: Headings, body text, labels, and descriptions - Controls all text colors throughout the app

layout.title: Layout
layout.description: Backgrounds, cards, panels, and surfaces - Controls layering and depth in your theme

interactive.title: Interactive
interactive.description: Buttons, inputs, checkboxes, and sliders - All interactive controls and form elements

borders.title: Borders
borders.description: Border colors for separators and outlines

feedback.title: Feedback
feedback.description: Success, warning, error, and info states - Alert banners, notifications, and status messages

navigation.title: Navigation
navigation.description: Header, tabs, and menus - Top navigation bar, active/inactive tabs, and mobile menu

dataDisplay.title: Data Display
dataDisplay.description: Charts, graphs, and progress bars - Data visualization colors for all chart types

accessControl.title: Access Control
accessControl.description: Public and secured badges - Security status indicators for API access control

sessions.title: Sessions
sessions.description: Authenticated users and guests - Colors for session badges and icons in the Users tab

events.title: Events
events.description: Calendar event colors - 8 customizable colors for events in the Events tab calendar and list views

platforms.title: Platforms
platforms.description: Steam, Epic, Origin, Blizzard, WSUS, Riot, Xbox - Platform-specific colors for badges and charts

performance.title: Performance
performance.description: Cache hit rate badges - High/medium/low performance indicators for cache efficiency

actions.title: Actions
actions.description: Reset, Process, and Delete buttons - Special action buttons in the management page

utilities.title: Utilities
utilities.description: Scrollbars and icon backgrounds - Specialized colors for dashboard stat card icons

cardOutline.label: Card Focus Outline
cardOutline.description: Outline color when cards are clicked/focused

checkboxHoverBg.label: Checkbox Hover Background
checkboxHoverBg.description: Background color when hovering unchecked checkboxes

checkboxFocus.label: Checkbox Focus
checkboxFocus.description: Outline color when checkbox is focused

success.label: Success Primary
success.description: Success state primary color (border for alerts)

warning.label: Warning Primary
warning.description: Warning state primary color (border for alerts)

error.label: Error Primary
error.description: Error state primary color (border for alerts)

info.label: Info Primary
info.description: Information state primary color (border for alerts)

userSessionColor.label: Authenticated User Color
userSessionColor.description: Icon and text color for authenticated users

userSessionBg.label: Authenticated User Background
userSessionBg.description: Background color for authenticated user badges

guestSessionColor.label: Guest User Color
guestSessionColor.description: Icon and text color for guest users

guestSessionBg.label: Guest User Background
guestSessionBg.description: Background color for guest user badges

hitRateHighBg.label: High Hit Rate Background
hitRateHighBg.description: Background for high cache hit rates

hitRateHighText.label: High Hit Rate Text
hitRateHighText.description: Text color for high hit rates

hitRateMediumBg.label: Medium Hit Rate Background
hitRateMediumBg.description: Background for medium cache hit rates

hitRateMediumText.label: Medium Hit Rate Text
hitRateMediumText.description: Text color for medium hit rates

hitRateLowBg.label: Low Hit Rate Background
hitRateLowBg.description: Background for low cache hit rates

hitRateLowText.label: Low Hit Rate Text
hitRateLowText.description: Text color for low hit rates

hitRateWarningText.label: Warning Hit Rate Text
hitRateWarningText.description: Text color for warning hit rates

steamApiKey.placeholder: Enter your Steam Web API key

apiKey.title: Authentication Required
apiKey.subtitle: Enter your API key for full access
apiKey.subtitleNewKey: Enter your new API key to continue
apiKey.subtitleDisabled: Authentication is disabled. Select how you'd like to proceed.
apiKey.label: API Key
apiKey.whereToFind: Where to find your API key:
apiKey.whereToFindDesc: Check your server logs for "API Key:" or look in
apiKey.noDataTooltip: No data available. Complete setup first.

dataSource.title: Choose Data Source
dataSource.subtitle: Select how to obtain depot mapping data for identifying Steam games
dataSource.depotMappingDesc: Links cache files to games. Essential for identifying which games are being cached.
dataSource.githubDesc: Community-maintained depot mappings. Quick and easy.
dataSource.steamDesc: Generate directly from Steam. Access all games.

steamWebApiKey.title: Steam Web API Key
steamWebApiKey.subtitle: Required to fetch depot information directly from Steam
steamWebApiKey.howToGet: How to get your API key:
steamWebApiKey.step4: Copy and paste your key below
steamWebApiKey.label: API Key
steamWebApiKey.placeholder: Enter your Steam Web API key
steamWebApiKey.securityNote: Your API key is encrypted and stored securely using Microsoft Data Protection API.
steamWebApiKey.networkError: Network error - failed to test API key
steamWebApiKey.networkErrorSave: Network error - failed to save API key

steamPicsAuth.title: Steam PICS Authentication
steamPicsAuth.subtitle: Choose how to authenticate with Steam for depot mapping data
steamPicsAuth.depotMappingDesc: Links cache files to games. Anonymous mode provides public games only. Account login enables access to playtest and restricted games.
steamPicsAuth.accountModeDesc: Access playtest and restricted games via V2
steamPicsAuth.accountModeUnavailable: V2 API unavailable - use V1 API key instead
steamPicsAuth.v2Required: Steam account login requires V2 API which is currently unavailable.
steamPicsAuth.v2RequiredWithV1: Your V1 API key already provides access to playtest/restricted games since it's tied to your Steam account.
steamPicsAuth.v2RequiredNoV1: You can configure a V1 API key later in Settings to access playtest/restricted games.
steamPicsAuth.networkError: Network error - failed to save authentication mode

picsProgress.buildingDesc: Fetching and processing depot information from Steam...
picsProgress.timeEstimate: This typically takes 1-5 minutes depending on your connection.

depotInit.title: Initialize Depot Data
depotInit.subtitle: Choose how to obtain depot mapping data
depotInit.downloadCompleteDesc: GitHub depot data has been imported successfully
depotInit.fetchingDesc: Fetching pre-created depot mappings from GitHub...
depotInit.githubUnavailable: GitHub download unavailable with Steam login. Your personalized depot data will be generated from Steam.
depotInit.failedToDownload: Failed to download pre-created depot data from GitHub
depotInit.unableToStart: Unable to start full scan. Please try again or download from GitHub.
depotInit.changeGapLarge: Change gap too large. Starting full scan...
depotInit.unableToStartScan: Unable to start scan. Please try downloading from GitHub instead.

depotMapping.title: Map Game Depots
depotMapping.subtitle: Map depot IDs to game names for your downloads
depotMapping.subtitleComplete: All downloads have been mapped to games
depotMapping.description: This step runs an incremental PICS scan to update depot mappings, then applies them to your downloads.
depotMapping.canSkip: You can skip this and map depots later from the Management tab.
depotMapping.setupComplete: Setup complete! Your Lancache Manager is ready to use.
depotMapping.viewDashboard: View your dashboard for cache statistics

logProcessing.title: Process Cache Logs
logProcessing.subtitle: Identify downloads and games from your cache history
logProcessing.subtitleComplete: All cache logs have been processed
logProcessing.subtitleMultiple: {{count}} datasources configured. Import all historical data to identify downloads.
logProcessing.description: Processing imports all log entries from the beginning to identify downloads and games. This can take several minutes depending on log size.
logProcessing.canSkip: You can skip this and process logs later from the Management tab.
logProcessing.complete: Log processing complete! Click Continue to proceed.

importHistorical.title: Import Historical Data
importHistorical.subtitle: Import download history from external database systems
importHistorical.skipNotice: Most users can skip this step. Only use if you have an existing database from a previous installation.
importHistorical.tryOtherModes: Try using Browse or Manual mode
importHistorical.addNewOnly: Only new records will be added.
importHistorical.checkDeveLanCache: Make sure to select a DeveLanCacheUI_Backend database for this import type.
importHistorical.checkLancacheManager: Make sure to select a LancacheManager database for this import type.

memory.title: Memory Diagnostics
memory.workingSetDesc: Physical RAM currently used by this process
memory.unmanagedDesc: Native memory used by system libraries and resources
memory.heapSizeDesc: Current size of the managed heap
memory.fragmentedDesc: Wasted space due to memory fragmentation
